Short definition: Industrial production index measures changes in industrial production and is widely used for the observation and analysis of the current economic activity.
Long definition: Industrial production index measures changes in industrial production and is widely used for the observation and analysis of the current economic activity. Monthly survey on industrial production of index allows identifying the turning points in economic development at an early stage.
Statistical concept and methodology: Score is 1 if the index is available monthly or quarterly. For assessment it will be looked back 8 years  starting 3 years before current year.
